If you're looking for a movie about journeys of self-discovery and resilience, then "Divergent" (2011) might be your cup of tea. It's a story about Tris, a Divergent who doesn't fit in with the strict factions based on virtues. But when a dangerous plot is revealed, Tris and the Four must work together to protect Divergents and the world from harm.

If you're interested in a movie about modern dating experiences, then "Her" (2013) would be a perfect choice. It explores the differences in dating for young single and young committed women today, through interviews and visual interpretations.

If you're looking for something more light-hearted and heartwarming, then "I Heart Huckabees" (2004) would be a great pick. It's a story about a husband-and-wife team who play detective, but not in the traditional sense.
